This article is about the druid. For the potion, see Sanfew serum.
Sanfew

Advanced data
NPC ID5044

Sanfew is the leader of the druids and resides in Taverley, on the 1st floor[UK]2nd floor[US] of Jatix's Herblore Shop. He plays a part in several quests, including Druidic Ritual, Eadgar's Ruse, and One Small Favour.

Goutweed Exchange[edit | edit source]

Sanfew will exchange goutweed for a clean herb.

The probabilities in this section are an estimation based on 500 goutweed exchanges.

The average Goutweed exchange is worth 930.05.
